statements: SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY panel_id DESC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location, panel_type FROM production_data WHERE panel_production > 100;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location FROM production_data WHERE panel_type = 'A' AND panel_last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_location, panel_production FROM production_data WHERE panel_location LIKE '%South%' ORDER BY panel_production DESC;
SELECT panel_type, COUNT(*) AS total_panels FROM production_data GROUP BY panel_type HAVING total_panels > 10;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location, panel_type, panel_production, panel_last_updated FROM production_data WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location FROM production_data WHERE panel_type = 'solar';
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, panel_last_updated FROM production_data WHERE panel_production > 1000;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE panel_last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY panel_production DESC;
SELECT panel_type, AVG(panel_production) AS avg_production FROM production_data GROUP BY panel_type HAVING avg_production > 5000;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_name, location FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, panel_name, production_date FROM solar_panels ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, panel_name, location FROM solar_panels WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE location='New York' AND efficiency > 0.15 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, panel_name, location FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency <= 0.10 ORDER BY location ASC, production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE avg_wind_speed >= 10.0 ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT id, turbine_name, location FROM wind_turbines WHERE avg_wind_speed < 8.0 ORDER BY avg_wind_speed DESC, location ASC;
SELECT id, panel_name, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE location='California' AND efficiency BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.3 ORDER BY efficiency DESC, panel_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY panel_id ASC;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency >= 20;
SELECT panel_name, production_date FROM SolarPanels WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_id, panel_name, efficiency, production_date FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY turbine_id DESC;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency DESC
SELECT device_id, production_quantity FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY production_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT panel_name, production_date FROM SolarPanels INNER JOIN ProductionData ON SolarPanels.panel_id = ProductionData.device_id
SELECT panel_name, production_quantity FROM SolarPanels LEFT JOIN ProductionData ON SolarPanels.panel_id = ProductionData.device_id WHERE production_quantity IS NULL
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT id, location, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT panel_type, location FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT location, rotor_diameter FROM WindTurbines WHERE turbine_type = 'Onshore';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT panel_type, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT location, panel_type FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT turbine_type, rotor_diameter FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY rotor_diameter ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelProduction WHERE production_amount > 500 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT solar_panel_id, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, production_output FROM SolarPanels WHERE production_output > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed > 20;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT location, production_date FROM SolarPanels WHERE production_output > 500;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT location, production_output FROM SolarPanels WHERE production_output BETWEEN 300 AND 600 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT SolarPanelPerformance.performance_date, SolarPanelPerformance.performance_metric, SolarPanels.location FROM SolarPanelPerformance JOIN SolarPanels ON SolarPanelPerformance.solar_panel_id = SolarPanels.solar_panel_id WHERE SolarPanels.location LIKE 'North%';
